compliance.headline: Built for Insurance Compliance
compliance.confidentiality: We understand insurance compliance requirements. All claim data is encrypted, access is logged, and we provide Business Associate Agreements for HIPAA compliance.

faq.question: Is SummarizePDF HIPAA compliant for medical claims?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer Business Associate Agreements (BAA), maintain HIPAA-compliant infrastructure, and encrypt all PHI. Perfect for health, workers' comp, and disability claims.

faq.question: Can it handle complex insurance policies?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our AI is trained on insurance language and understands coverage terms, exclusions, and limits. It works with all policy types: auto, home, commercial, life, health.

faq.question: How does it help with fraud detection?
faq.answer: The AI highlights inconsistencies, unusual patterns, and red flags in claims documentation. Your SIU team can then investigate suspicious claims faster.

faq.question: What plan is best for insurance companies?
faq.answer: It depends on claim volume. Small agencies use Pro ($19/mo). Large carriers need our Enterprise plan with advanced security, SSO, and dedicated support. Contact sales for volume pricing.

faq.question: Can multiple adjusters share claim summaries?
faq.answer: Yes! The Team plan ($49/mo) allows unlimited users to collaborate on claims. Perfect for claims departments and SIU teams.

faq.question: How secure is our claims data?
faq.answer: Very secure! We're SOC 2 certified with AES-256 encryption, access controls, and complete audit trails. Your claims data is never shared or used for AI training.
